thread.title_full: Map Out Unique Decor - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Map Out Unique Decor
text:
Rand McNally
New Rand McNally maps and wall art offer unique way to show off love of places and travel
SKOKIE, Ill. , Aug. 17, Nearly half of all moves take place in the summer*; so if you're among the many people moving into a new home or office right now, you're likely looking at fresh walls as blank as a canvas. Incorporating maps as décor is a great way to display your personality, show where you've traveled, and indicate where you'd like to journey next.
Let Rand McNally show you how to wake up your walls with a new variety of wall maps and map art available for home and office:
When decorating a child's room or classroom, chose the Signature World and U.S. maps with their bold and vivid colors. Featuring a classic blue ocean, these maps make a vibrant statement as well as useful reference pieces. Hang the sophisticated parchment-style Classic Edition World and U.S. wall map to show a love of travel. Designed for a living room as well as a board room, these maps add a touch of class. The Premium World map features saturated colors printed on a silky smooth polyethylene paper that gives the piece a lustrous sheen. This map fits best on the walls of a modern office or home. Artist Wendy Gold's unique ImagineNations™ creations add flair and a whimsical element to a room. The lithographs inspire conversation, including a world map with butterflies, a world map featuring a peace on Earth motif, and a "Jardin Monde" map showing the world as an overflowing cornucopia. Once you have your art, it's all about presentation. It's important to hang artwork at the right height. Keep in mind the average human eye level is about 57 inches from the floor. Of course, creating the unexpected can be a great way to decorate, such as hanging art low below the window so those seated can enjoy the piece at eye level.
And remember, globes also add a flourish to a desk or shelf. A 12-inch Atlas desk globe , with the bronzed titan holding the world on his shoulders, fits in a variety of spaces.
Peruse store.randmcnally.com for more decorating ideas.
*Source: U.S. Census Bureau
About Rand McNally – Rand McNally is the country's most trusted source for maps, navigation, and travel content. Products and services include: America's #1 Road Atlas; IntelliRoute® truck routing software; TND™ truck GPS; HD 100 E-Log devices; TPC 7600 and TND™ 760 mobile fleet management solutions; RVND™ GPS for RVers; and leading geography-based educational resources for the classroom. Learn more at randmcnally.com
